channel.title: Halo hacks (FOR PC ONLY)
channel.description:
Ever Wanted some kool hacks for halo PC? [i]Sorry if this was used in other TUTS[/i]
[b][i][u]Today is Your DAY![/u][/i][/b]
This Tutorial Will Give you the Links to the hacks, But not only that [b]Show you how to use them~![/b] [b][i][u]DO NOT FLAME ME![/u][/i][/b]
[u][i][b]AIMBOT[/b][/i][/u] OK Here is one of [i][b]MY[/b][/i] personal Favorite. The [b]AIMBOT[/b]
[b]Description:[/b]
The halo aimbot is a bot that allows the player to auto-matically aim at the oppents head cauasing a ......BOOM? [u][i][b]"Head Shot"[/b][/i][/u]
But don't Asume that it's a one hit killer....no I'll give you that hack later..
Visual Description =) : [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=l_P32oyrYcM]http://youtube.com/watch?v=l_P32oyrYcM[/url] <-----ok visual [url=http://media.putfile.com/aimbot15]http://media.putfile.com/aimbot15[/url] <----- hate putfile but good visual [b][i](Don't mind end -.- )[/i][/b]
[b]How to use:[/b]
First run your halo, Then while halo is running open up Halo aimbot then while in game press "[b][i]"shift"[/i][/b]" and make sure to hold it,while doing this the corsshair should aim towards the head and you should....ummm SHOOT?
Link: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DTE0WQ1R]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DTE0WQ1R[/url] It's clean for me (always make sure)
[u][i][b]Ultimate Hack program[/b][/i][/u] Ok now For the Ultimate hack(s) in [b]one[/b] program!
[b][i]Description:[/i][/b]
This hack includes goodies for any pro....cough cough* (noob) cough cough* <---- jk lol
Hack includes:
[b]deathless player never hurt from falls infin gernades bump possion (you might be WTF? It allows you to become another player when you bump into them) super jump ( visual here: [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=dAV1WX0Opvc]http://youtube.com/watch?v=dAV1WX0Opvc[/url]) All damage on you (gay -.- ) Medusa (if players look at you..ermmm they DIE! ermm yeah!) one shot kills IGNORE "UNKNOWN" I have not tried bottomless clip (unlimted ammo with no clip animation) How can I Forget Time freeze[/b]
[i]This hack is called the Dev program[/i]
Link: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6ZCFF1FJ]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6ZCFF1FJ[/url]
[b]You run same as aimbot rest is obovious[/b]
Hope you enjoyed my TUT any problems? Post here!
[i][b]-----> TUT on how to get Halo CE! [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,35151.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,35151.0.html[/url] <---------[/b][/i]

i hate prople who use aimbot
if you use aimbot well you probably don’t want to run this program

YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED

public class aimbot
{ 
  public static void main(String[] args)
  {
    String response = "aimbot ";
    String insult = response + "is for noobs ";
    String thing = insult + "who cant play halo";
    System.out.println(thing);
  }
}

and yes im learning java.

item.title: Halo hacks (FOR PC ONLY)
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Ever Wanted some kool hacks for halo PC? Sorry if this was used in other TUTS

Today is Your DAY!

This Tutorial Will Give you the Links to the hacks, But not only that Show you how to use them~!
DO NOT FLAME ME!

AIMBOT
OK Here is one of MY personal Favorite. The AIMBOT

Description:

The halo aimbot is a bot that allows the player to auto-matically aim at the oppents head cauasing a …BOOM? “Head Shot”

But don’t Asume that it’s a one hit killer…no I’ll give you that hack later…

Visual Description =) :
http://youtube.com/watch?v=l_P32oyrYcM <-----ok visual
http://media.putfile.com/aimbot15 <----- hate putfile but good visual (Don’t mind end -.- )

How to use:

First run your halo, Then while halo is running open up Halo aimbot then while in game press ““shift”” and make sure to hold it,while doing this the corsshair should aim towards the head and you should…ummm SHOOT?

Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DTE0WQ1R
It’s clean for me (always make sure)

Ultimate Hack program
Ok now For the Ultimate hack(s) in one program!

Description:

This hack includes goodies for any pro…cough cough* (noob) cough cough* <---- jk lol

Hack includes:

deathless player
never hurt from falls
infin gernades
bump possion (you might be WTF? It allows you to become another player when you bump into them)
super jump ( visual here: http://youtube.com/watch?v=dAV1WX0Opvc)
All damage on you (gay -.- )
Medusa (if players look at you…ermmm they DIE! ermm yeah!)
one shot kills
IGNORE “UNKNOWN” I have not tried
bottomless clip (unlimted ammo with no clip animation)
How can I Forget Time freeze

This hack is called the Dev program

Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6ZCFF1FJ

You run same as aimbot rest is obovious
